page.title: 03FARMING IN TWYFORD
page.content: Rapeseed was one of the main crops that hade been planted.There was lots of cows on rough grazing land.We fount out that there were two different shapes of bales. One kind of bales were round and other kinds were rectangular bales. There were some cultiuated land behind the farms,with no cows on it.One of the farms had very old machinery that were pulled by horses. The second farm had a dog and new machinery, including a combine harvester which was probably used by the other farms.We noticed a goose in one of the farms.Another farmer oned a bull a long time ago that killed a boy of 15.Some of the land which we saw were not owned by farmers in twyford.One of the farmers had a couple of tractors.
